title: White Chicken Chili
tagline: Creamy, warming, and lighter than red chili.
description: Creamy, warming, and lighter than red chili.
ingredients: Sour cream, cilantro, lime for serving
steps: Season chicken with salt and pepper. Sear in oil until cooked through. Remove and shred.
Sauté onion until soft. Add garlic, cook 1 minute.
Add beans, broth, chiles, cumin, oregano, cayenne. Bring to simmer.
Cook 15 minutes. Mash some beans against the pot to thicken.
Stir in cream cheese until melted. Add shredded chicken.
Serve topped with sour cream, cilantro, and lime.
notes: Rotisserie chicken: Great shortcut—use 3 cups shredded.
More heat: Add diced jalapeño with the onion.
Even better next day: Flavors meld overnight.
